title: Colin Smith (Scottish footballer)
text: Colin Smith (born 9 January 1951) is a retired amateur Scottish <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="centre%20forward">centre forward</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a>, <a href="Stranraer%20F.C.">Stranraer</a> and <a href="Partick%20Thistle%20F.C.">Partick Thistle</a>. He was capped by Scotland at <a href="Scotland%20national%20amateur%20football%20team">amateur</a> level.
